alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 27 at 1:33AM MST until January 28 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds increasing rapidly this evening. Expect winds speeds of 15 to 25 mph, with gusts up to 45 mph. Localized gusts of 50 to 60 mph near southwest facing terrain, with even higher speeds over the San Francisco Peaks. * WHERE...Areas immediately south and southwest of the San Francisco Peaks and Mt Elden. Areas from Stoneman Lake northward to Munds Park. Areas just southwest of the Mogollon Rim, but generally north of Payson. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized damage possible in Skyline Estates, Mt Elden Estates and Schultz Creek Road. Localized damage possible near Washington Park, Kohls Ranch and Stoneman Lake.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
